issue.title: Audit of topics to ensure no cheating allowed

content.raw:
Also all /controller_manager services need to be blacklisted.

We asked at the beginning of the challenge (#!/osrf/srcsim/issues/51/custom-controller)  if we could load our own controllers and the answer was no. 

So I believe that to be fair to all competitors who have adapted to use IHMC controller those services should be blacklisted.
